snippet: “Take My Money, HBO!” is a Web page meant to encourage HBO to allow Internet-only subscriptions. Via Twitter, HBO indicated that it was better off keeping with its cable and satellite partners.
abstract: “Take My Money, HBO!” is a Web page meant to encourage HBO to allow Internet-only subscriptions. Via Twitter, HBO indicated that it was better off keeping with its cable and satellite partners.
lead_paragraph: HBO doesn’t want your money, Web-only television viewers.

headline.main: HBO Says No, for Now, to Fans Who Want a Web-Only Option
